category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, removes Dampness, controls bleeding and removes toxicity

indications: Jaundice, dysentery, hemoptysis, epistaxis, functional uterine bleeding, leukorrhea, pharyngitis, carbuncle

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Dry Heat.
Contraindicated for those with Deficiency Cold.

notes: This herb clears Heat accumulated under the skin and in the Stomach.
It eliminates hemostasis and disperses masses.
It is special for eliminating Stagnation.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It is said to cure incised wounds and furuncles.
